name.description: Icon name, see example icon set, if the name has a /, it will be considered an image icon
name.description_zh: 图标名称，见示例图标集，如名称带有/，会被认为是图片图标

index.description: A value that distinguishes between multiple icons, which is passed out via the click event when the icon is clicked
index.description_zh: 一个用于区分多个图标的值，点击图标时通过click事件传出

hover-class.description: 图标按下去的样式类，用法同uni的view组件的hover-class参数，详见：hover-class  (opens new window)
hover-class.description_zh: 图标按下去的样式类，用法同uni的view组件的hover-class参数，详见：hover-class  (opens new window)

label.description: Label text to the right/below the icon

custom-prefix.description: This value is required when customizing the font icon library, see: Extending the Custom Icon Library
custom-prefix.description_zh: 自定义字体图标库时，需要写上此值，详见：扩展自定义图标库  (opens new window)

margin-left.description: The distance between the label and the icon when it is on the right, in rpx
margin-left.description_zh: label在右方时与图标的距离，单位rpx

margin-top.description: The distance of the label from the icon when it is below, in rpx
margin-top.description_zh: label在下方时与图标的距离，单位rpx

margin-bottom.description: The distance between the label and the icon when it is on top, in rpx
margin-bottom.description_zh: label在上方时与图标的距离，单位rpx

margin-right.description: The distance between the label and the icon when it is on the left, in rpx
margin-right.description_zh: label在左侧时与图标的距离，单位rpx

label-pos.description: The position of the label relative to the icon (left and top are new in 1.4.1)
label-pos.description_zh: label相对于图标的位置(left和top为1.4.1新增)

custom-style.description: The style of the icon, you can set the font size, color, etc., object form, size and color priority above this parameter
custom-style.description_zh: 图标的样式，可以设置字体大小，颜色等，对象形式，size和color优先级高于此参数

width.description: name is the width of the image in any unit, and the default value is rpx
width.description_zh: name为图片路径时图片的宽度，单位任意，数值默认为rpx单位

height.description: name is the height of the image in any unit, and the value is rpx by default
height.description_zh: name为图片路径时图片的高度，单位任意，数值默认为rpx单位

top.description: In some scenes, if the icon is not vertically centered, you can adjust this parameter in any unit, and the value is rpx unit by default
top.description_zh: 如果某些场景，如果图标没有垂直居中，可以调整此参数，单位任意，数值默认为rpx单位

inactive-color.description: Background color, accent color acceptable, only valid when Decimal
inactive-color.description_zh: 背景颜色，可接受主题色，仅Decimal时有效

percent.description: The percentage shown is valid only when Decimal
percent.description_zh: 显示的百分比，仅Decimal时有效

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the icon is clicked
